Posts.Content: Hi all, Just joining Jan club now although officially started Dec. I had first AC a week ago and felt so nauseous and ill l could not even look at the internet until today. Tried an abundance of anti sick meds,nothing made much diff, but think it just faded away itself in the end. Anyone know if the 1st is particularly worse or is there no set pattern. Also getting strange almost period like pains this evening? Even though finished my period? Thank you and good wishes to all
Posts.Title: * * * January 2017 breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: Hi Just before 2 and chemo next week, does anyone know if you are struggling to keep up water intake because of nausea, would the odd Diorilite help? Thanks
Posts.Title: * * * January 2017 breast cancer chemo club * * *

Posts.Content: Kacang(Lynn), Fiddler crab, Jo, Carolyn thank you for all those tips. Will get sports type bottle to sip lying diwn, and good to know about Dioralite, last thing I want is it to cause me to need extra fluid. Thanks again ladies....
Posts.Title: * * * January 2017 breast cancer chemo club * * *
